name: Labyrinth (itch) (SimonK1605)
description:
Labyrinth is my first game, it was created with the Unity Game Engine. With atmospheric music, you can collect different characters in a total of eight levels, explore paths and, of course, find your way out of the maze. A small tutorial level will teach you everything you need to succeed in the labyrinth!

There are items that will help you reach your goal faster, but also AI enemies that will hunt you down! The controls and the menu are very simple, you can always change your skin, turn the music up and down and get an overview of the levels. 

What are you waitin' for? The dark ways of the labyrinth are open to you!

Have fun and thank you! :)

Cover Desing Roman Tuch: https://twitter.com/romantuch_and https://www.instagram.com/romantuch/
